item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】AIFF - PROMO ONLY MUSIC LINE
item.description:
Is anyone familiar with the Promo Only music line of CDs for music for radio DJs?

More info her: https://promoonly.com/about

In summary, the Promo Only music line is a monthly release with clean edited radio friendly versions of music tracks for DJs

The Promo Only music line been in existence since 1992

They released multiple CDs in various genres on a monthly basis, up until December 2014

From 2015 they started a new digital download service and stopped the CD production

I'm missing quite a few releases from 2015 to 2023

Unfortunately the new digital download system only allows for 3 months of old issues

Need access to download the older releases (2015-2023) - whether from sharing a personal collection or through a bot or other related backdoor download service

This the URL to the download service - https://pool.promoonly.com/login

I'm willing to make an offer to anyone who can get me access to the digital downloads

Cash offer or exchange for something else of interest - possibly my collection of the Promo Only CDs from 2000-2014 - or a mixture of both or something else of interest - negotiable

FYI - LOSSLESS FORMAT ONLY !!! - i.e. uncompressed WAV / AIFF / FLAC files - NO MP3 whatsoever !!!!

Email at brentnicholas38@gmail.com to discuss further
item.author: brentnicholas38
